video.title: Rescue Me
video.synopsis: Haunted by his past, a veteran New York City firefighter struggles to handle his high-stress job and the emotional turmoil of his personal life.

episodes.synopsis: New York City firefighter Tommy Gavin wrestles with his demons and haunting memories of a cousin who died at the World Trade Center.
episodes.title: Guts

episodes.synopsis: When a retired fireman comes out of the closet, the revelation rocks the New York Fire Department.
episodes.title: Gay

episodes.synopsis: As Jerry faces harsh discipline, Tommy discovers that harassing Janet's boyfriend comes with a price.
episodes.title: Kansas

episodes.synopsis: As Franco is accused of fathering an ex-girlfriend's child, Tommy gets devastating news at the site of a car accident.
episodes.title: DNA

episodes.synopsis: As Franco considers being a single father, Tommy has second thoughts about standing in Janet's way.
episodes.title: Orphans

episodes.synopsis: Tommy has Roger arrested in connection with his assault. Meanwhile, Franco kidnaps Keela from an abusive home.
episodes.title: Revenge

episodes.synopsis: Mulling over what to do about Janet, Tommy seeks a therapist's advice.
episodes.title: Butterfly

episodes.synopsis: During a contest to crown the best-endowed fireman, Tommy becomes the object of a Sept. 11 widow's fantasies.
episodes.title: Inches

episodes.synopsis: As Tommy learns that a woman is being assigned to the firehouse, he looks to avenge Billy Warren's death.
episodes.title: Alarm

episodes.synopsis: While trying to keeping his affair with Sheila a secret from Jimmy's ghost, Tommy struggles to meet his financial obligations to Janet.
episodes.title: Immortal

episodes.synopsis: The death of Tommy's mother forces him to take responsibility for his increasingly unstable father.
episodes.title: Mom

episodes.synopsis: As another plea for money reveals that Janet has been lying to Tommy, Sean tries to make amends with Laura.
episodes.title: Leaving

episodes.synopsis: As Tommy prepares for a hockey game against the police, suspicions about him and Sheila are confirmed; Jerry learns about his wife's ill health.
episodes.title: Sanctuary

episodes.synopsis: Exiled to a quiet Staten Island firehouse as a result of his responsibility for Franco's injuries, Tommy looks for a way to get back to 62 Truck.
episodes.title: Voicemail

episodes.synopsis: Tommy joins a fireman's barbershop quartet as a way to track down Janet and the kids.
episodes.title: Harmony

episodes.synopsis: Chief Perrolli agrees to take Tommy back -- on the condition that all of 62 Truck's firefighters want him.
episodes.title: Balls

episodes.synopsis: As Laura files a formal complaint against Lou, Tommy returns to 62 Truck.
With Chief Perrolli looking to make sure that Tommy stays clean, the Gavin brothers learn about their father's secret family.
episodes.title: Sensitivity

episodes.synopsis: As Tommy learns the truth about Sheila's pregnancy, Sean discovers that the woman he's dating is a firebug.
episodes.title: Reunion

episodes.synopsis: After stashing his kids with his father, Tommy looks for a place to live and a new drug supply.
episodes.title: Shame

episodes.synopsis: As a party forces Jerry to face his feelings about his gay son, Tommy's efforts to hide his children unravel.
episodes.title: Believe

episodes.synopsis: Stealing Janet's antidepressants transforms Tommy into a new man.
episodes.title: Rebirth

episodes.synopsis: Tommy and Mickey uncover proof that their half-brother is a child molester.
episodes.title: Brains

episodes.synopsis: Tommy is enlisted to talk his nephew out of becoming a firefighter.
episodes.title: Bitch

episodes.synopsis: The prospect of their father inheriting a fortune brings Tommy's estranged sister, Maggie, back home.
episodes.title: Happy

episodes.synopsis: With Janet holding him responsible for their son's death, Tommy hatches a lethal plan for revenge with his father and Uncle Teddy.
episodes.title: Justice

episodes.synopsis: Tommy grapples with his impending divorce, drinking, smoking, caring for his father and his uncle's legal troubles.
episodes.title: Devil

episodes.synopsis: Tommy struggles to keep his life under control as Sean and Johnny do their best to keep him from learning some troubling secrets.
episodes.title: Discovery

episodes.synopsis: Still seething over Janet's relationship with his brother, Tommy finds that getting Nell Turbody to end her affair with his nephew comes with a price.
episodes.title: Torture

episodes.synopsis: Sean reveals his relationship with his sister to Tommy, who already knew; Sheila pushes Tommy to use a sperm bank to ensure the Gavin family's legacy.
episodes.title: Sparks

episodes.synopsis: Tommy urges his former sister-in-law to help take revenge on Johnny and Janet; Franco discovers that his new girlfriend has kidnapped his daughter.
episodes.title: Chlamydia

episodes.synopsis: Tommy conspires with Johnny's ex-wife to make his brother and Janet jealous; an overdose of sleeping pills sends Sean on a sleepwalking rampage.
episodes.title: Zombies

episodes.synopsis: Tommy fights his survivor's guilt depression as Sheila sets out to get revenge for his affair with Angie.
episodes.title: Satisfaction

episodes.synopsis: Sean proposes to Maggie; Lou tries yoga; Tommy struggles to keep things going with the three women in his life: Sheila, Angie and Janet.
episodes.title: Karate

episodes.synopsis: Tommy's concerns about his safety grow as he discovers that the firefighters of 62 Truck are preparing to move on.
episodes.title: Pieces

episodes.synopsis: Sheila gives Tommy a Cadillac to spur him to marriage; Franco's effort to impress Natalie backfires; Mike's gay affair upends his transfer.
episodes.title: Retards

episodes.synopsis: As caring for his aging father creates even more pressure for Tommy, Lou admits to dating a nun while Jerry looks for help performing in bed.
episodes.title: Twilight

episodes.synopsis: With Johnny's murder coming on the heels of Jerry's near-fatal stroke, the wheels of change are set in motion for Tommy, his family and his friends.
episodes.title: Hell

episodes.synopsis: Following Johnny's funeral, Tommy wrestles with how he's going to care for his family and deliver on his promise to retire and live with Sheila.
episodes.title: Beached

episodes.synopsis: An arson investigation targets Tommy, Janet worries that her new baby doesn't like her, and Sean tries to cope with Maggie's porn collection.
episodes.title: Babyface

episodes.synopsis: As Tommy presses Sheila for a believable story that will end the arson investigation, he and Janet worry that Colleen has run away from home.
episodes.title: Tuesday

episodes.synopsis: Tommy's plan to make Colleen return home backfires, and Jerry must come to grips with being forced into a desk job.
episodes.title: Commitment

episodes.synopsis: Tommy looks to patch things up with Janet, Mike struggles to cope with his mom's death, and Sean threatens Maggie with a divorce.
episodes.title: Pussified

episodes.synopsis: As Teddy struggles in rehab and Lou recruits for the station's basketball team, Tommy discovers that Sheila may have lied about the beach house fire.
episodes.title: Black

episodes.synopsis: Sean looks to uncover the secret that Mike is hiding in his late mother's bedroom, while Tommy tries to understand the deal Lou struck with a rookie.
episodes.title: Balance

episodes.synopsis: Despite their heroic efforts, the crew from 62 Truck is savaged in the press for being unable to save seven children from dying in a tragic fire.
episodes.title: Seven

episodes.synopsis: As news that Tommy gave Sheila the baby sends Janet packing, he's pressured to take Chief Feinberg's daughter, Beth, on a date.
episodes.title: Solo

episodes.synopsis: In the wake of the intervention to help Maggie and Uncle Teddy, Tommy struggles to put his life back together after Janet throws him out.
episodes.title: Animal

episodes.synopsis: After bribing Colleen for access to the baby and information about Janet, Tommy gains insight into his childhood during a conversation with his dad.
episodes.title: High

episodes.synopsis: As he makes good on his promises to get a car for Colleen and access to the baby for Sheila, Tommy struggles to keep from drinking.
episodes.title: Cycle

episodes.synopsis: While wearing his late cousin Jimmy's bunker jacket, Tommy secretly helps save Mike from the mistakes of his new hard-drinking crew.
episodes.title: Keefe

episodes.synopsis: As the sighting of Jimmy's ghost has the firehouse on edge, Tommy looks to repair his many failed relationships.
episodes.title: Yaz

episodes.synopsis: A hearing will determine Tommy's future as a firefighter; Mike is persuaded to buy a bar; Black Shawn reveals that he's dating Colleen Gavin.
episodes.title: Baptism

episodes.synopsis: A French writer arrives to research a book on Sept. 11; Tommy discovers a secret about Janet's new guy; Mike and his pals prepare to open their bar.
episodes.title: French

episodes.synopsis: As Tommy plots to sabotage Black Shawn's chances of marrying Colleen, Lou sparks a romance with a French woman who's writing a book about Sept. 11.
episodes.title: Wine

episodes.synopsis: A close look at video footage from Sept.11 leads Tommy to suspect that Jimmy didn't actually die in the World Trade Center attack.
episodes.title: Jimmy

episodes.synopsis: Tommy learns of Katy's move to a boarding school, Garrity gets bad health news and Sheila asks Mike to help Damien prepare for firefighter training.
episodes.title: Sheila

episodes.synopsis: As Garrity tries to keep his cancer a secret, Tommy finally reveals his feelings about what happened on Sept. 11.
episodes.title: Perspective

episodes.synopsis: Reuniting for the weekend, Tommy and Janet visit Katy at school in Rhode Island and try to have something resembling a normal family weekend together.
episodes.title: Play

episodes.synopsis: As Tommy's drinking brings him face to face with the ghosts of his past, tragedy strikes when Damien rides along on a call with 62 Truck.
episodes.title: Iceman

episodes.synopsis: In the aftermath of his heroic rescue of Damien, Tommy discovers that he's become a sex object for Sheila and his ex-wife, Janet.
episodes.title: Thaw

episodes.synopsis: As Tommy's friends learn of his drinking, Sean's battle with cancer is made even harder by the arrival of his overly critical mom and spoiled brother.
episodes.title: Control

episodes.synopsis: While Sean makes final preparations for his surgery, Colleen goads her father into getting revenge for Black Shawn's comments about her.
episodes.title: Mickey

episodes.synopsis: Sean recovers in the hospital, Lou is tempted by his ex-girlfriend, and Tommy realizes his kids know more about his drinking than he thought.
episodes.title: Disease

episodes.synopsis: With Sean in the hospital struggling to recover from his cancer surgery, Tommy reacts badly to a gruesome traffic accident.
episodes.title: Torch

episodes.synopsis: Following Franco's successful ring debut, the firefighters turn to Damien to tell Franco that the female boxer he's fallen for is a lesbian.
episodes.title: Wheels

episodes.synopsis: As Sean returns to the firehouse following his surgery, Tommy finds it is going to be hard to keep his promise to watch over 62 Truck's new probie.
episodes.title: Initiation

episodes.synopsis: In the wake of bad publicity brought on by the brawl he caused at a firefighter's memorial service, Tommy is assigned to keep the firehouse clean.
episodes.title: Clean

episodes.synopsis: After the benefit for Garrity erupts into a brawl pitting firefighters against lesbians, Tommy must choose between Janet and Sheila.
episodes.title: Lesbos

episodes.synopsis: As Tommy is forced to choose between Janet and Sheila, Needles and Lou arrange for Franco to get into the ring with a lesbian.
episodes.title: Carrot

episodes.synopsis: As Tommy steps in to protect Damien from a sexually aggressive older woman, Lou admits to having reservations about Tommy being his best man.
episodes.title: David

episodes.synopsis: As he looks to prevent Damien from getting involved with an older woman, Tommy struggles to choose between Janet and Sheila.
episodes.title: Zippo

episodes.synopsis: Tommy and Kelly are bound by common personal tragedies, Lou looks to settle all scores with his larcenous wife, and tragedy again strikes the family.
episodes.title: Jump

episodes.synopsis: Janet and Sheila team up to undermine Tommy's latest romance; Teddy's struggle with Ellie's death threatens to bring more suffering to 62 Truck.
episodes.title: Drink

episodes.synopsis: After being shot by Uncle Teddy, Tommy comes back from the dead to face a world that's conspiring to keep him from drinking again.
episodes.title: Legacy

episodes.synopsis: After learning that his friends assumed many of his familial duties, Tommy tries to regain a position of influence with his family.
episodes.title: Change

episodes.synopsis: As Tommy fights to stay sober, he faces a difficult shift upon returning to work after being shot.
episodes.title: Comeback

episodes.synopsis: Needles and Tommy hatch a plan to spring Lou from the hospital when a competing firehouse looks to take advantage of his condition.
episodes.title: Breakout

episodes.synopsis: Tommy must look for his missing daughter Colleen after a wild night together that he can't remember.
episodes.title: Blackout

episodes.synopsis: Tommy's efforts to help Colleen stop drinking force him to face demons from his checkered past.
episodes.title: Sanctuary

episodes.synopsis: After Colleen drops the assault charges against Tommy, he heads back to work -- only to discover that 62 Truck has been shut down.
episodes.title: Forgiven

episodes.synopsis: As publicity from a rescue gives 62 Truck a new lease on life, Janet agrees to give Tommy one last chance, but only if he ends his affair with Sheila.
episodes.title: Cowboy

episodes.synopsis: Tommy vows to get his life back on track, Lou continues to ignore his failing health, and Damien struggles with his decision to quit the department.
episodes.title: Good-Bye

episodes.synopsis: While Tommy refocuses his attention on the injured Damien, the firefighters vent their outrage about the site chosen to memorialize a fallen comrade.
episodes.title: A.D.D.

episodes.synopsis: As Sheila bonds with Janet over her pregnancy, Tommy discovers Colleen working at the bar owned by Mickey and Uncle Teddy.
episodes.title: Mutha

episodes.synopsis: As the crew copes with three long and quiet weeks at work, Tommy discovers that the women in his life have united against him.
episodes.title: Menses

episodes.synopsis: Black Shawn looks for help in scaling back Colleen's wedding plans, while Tommy tries to avoid being interviewed on television about his cousin Jimmy.
episodes.title: Press

episodes.synopsis: Upset by Tommy's bitter and caustic television interview, Franco looks to move beyond 62 Truck before his career becomes tainted.
episodes.title: Brownies

episodes.synopsis: With Tommy facing suspension and more bad press in the wake of his interview, his fellow firefighters engage in a campaign to save him.
episodes.title: Head

episodes.synopsis: An unconscious violation of Sheila's privacy gets Tommy in trouble with his family, and Lou challenges Franco to do a better job of running 62 Truck.
With Tommy ostracized by his family, Lou looks to rehabilitate him by giving the Gavin family the letters Tommy wrote for them to read after he died.
episodes.title: Jeter

episodes.synopsis: In the Gavin family tradition, Colleen's wedding is an emotional if not debaucherous affair. But the high spirits fade quickly.
episodes.title: Vows

episodes.synopsis: After the fire, the members of 62 Truck struggle to pick up the pieces, while the new probies hear a familiar speech and stand before a new leader.
episodes.title: Ashes
